segments.text: That price of ours , by the way , is for a minimum quantity of 1,000 saddles .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I noticed that . To what extent would local assembly help sales , did you say ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: 20-30 % . But we proposed the plan from the storage and delivery viewpoint . That is to say , less warehouse space and prompt delivery .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , of course . Assembly would be quite a simple matter . Cycle dealers could put them together in a very short time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sales have been exceptionally good during the past twelve months .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I've noticed that . Where have you been placing them ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All in the local market . One or two suggestions that came in from the distribution might interest you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . What were they ? Anything that will help sales ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Perhaps . General opinion is that the rear carrier should be offered as an extra .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's to keep the price down , I suppose . I'll take it up with our overseas department and listen to what they've got to say about this .
segments.speaker: S2
